attributes.action: allow men to run in the Cancer Research UK's 'Race For Life' event
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My cousin died recently from breast cancer, which has devastated our family, and a number of my female relatives are running the Race For Life. My brother and I wish to run along-side and collect sponsors, but the charity actively excludes men from doing so.  This is disgusting and I would like it changed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
